mapper.select: select r.reviewNum, r.reviewStars, r.reviewImage , r.reviewContent, r.reviewDay, u.userId from review r join user u on r.userNum = u.userNum order by r.reviewNum desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{startRow}
mapper.insert: insert into review (reviewStars, reviewImage, reviewContent, reviewDay, userNum) values (#{reviewStars}, #{reviewImage}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewDay}, #{userNum})
